pages.text: Place two sets of bones, a netherStar, a Crown of the Cursed King, and a set of diamonds on the altar and hold the Bloodwood Sword and right-click on the altar to create it. There is an 80% chance of dropping the Orphic Pearls - Yellow and Orphic Pearls - Green, etc.

In the altar relics will be 10 king's emblem discipline 4 netherStar ender gobber block dragon egg aura treasure into the altar and hold the shadow gobber sword and press Shift right altar to generate. There is an 80% chance of dropping the Orphic Pearl - Purple.
